title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 471.4 - Standards pertaining to the instructions for use of gun locking devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 471.4 - Standards pertaining to the instructions for use of gun locking devices

State Regulations
A gun locking device must be accompanied by written
instructions on its proper installation and removal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
471.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
